attributes.action: UKBA - Speed up applications for people applying for extension of their stay.
attributes.additional_details: UKBA need to speed up applications for people applying for extension of their stay in the UK as it is taking incredibly longer than stated in the application form. I know people who have applied since 2008, five years on,  have yet to hear from UKBA as their applications are still pending. No explication whatsoever for the time it takes before dealing with these applications.
